## ObjectConverter.required() method

Creates a new [ObjectConverter](./ts-utils.conversion.objectconverter.md) derived from this one but with all properties required.

**Signature:**

```typescript
required(): ObjectConverter<Required<T>, TC>;
```
**Returns:**

[ObjectConverter](./ts-utils.objectconverter.md)<!-- -->&lt;Required&lt;T&gt;, TC&gt;
